SIGN IN

TRANSFORM ENTIRE DOCUMENTS INTO ACTIONABLE DATA

Document engineering empowers business users with impact on Day One, without any massive investment in machine learning, staff training, or IT development.

Docugami developed a proprietary Business Document Foundation Model, an LLM for Generative AI applied to your documents.

TRY IT FREE Apply Now

Your Industry, Your Documents, Your Business Insights

SUPPLY CHAIN

Analyze Supplier and Distribution agreements for risk, pricing, variations, and obligations.​

 

Avoid costly penalties, escalators due to delays or dependencies.

COMMERCIAL INSURANCE

Extract, Transform and Generate Policies, Certificates, Quotes, Applications, Loss Runs and SOVs.

 

Unlock efficiencies and risk insights in minutes from your documents.

PROFESSIONAL SERVICES

Scour your MSAs and SOWs for deliverables, pricing, liabilities, and legal risk.​ ​

 

Avoid expensive surprises. Cut the cost of diligence in transactions.

COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE

Identify price variations, renewal deadlines, sub-lease options, and tax issues across entire portfolios.

 

Comply with tax laws. Optimize rents. Avoid fees.

CLINICAL TRIALS

Develop and analyze clinical trial protocol to meet all regulatory and testing requirements.

​

Assure quality reviews and documentation.

YOUR BUSINESS

Unlock the data in your unique documents to increase productivity, compliance, and insight.

 

Re-paper legacy licenses to comply with new regulatory and customer requirements.

DON'T SETTLE FOR INTELLIGENT DOCUMENT PROCESSING

You Need Document Engineering

Data extraction models and solutions have inherently and consistently failed to directly empower business users.

Docugami delivers immediate impact. No lengthy setup process. No rigid templates or fields. No rip and replace. Just easy connections to your familiar tools and line-of-business systems. Highly variable documents with unstructured text turn into structured information!

LEARN MORE
CONTRACT LIFECYCLE MANAGEMENT IS NOT ENOUGH

Unlock the Data in Your Documents to Power Your Business

Docugami creates a hierarchical data representation of each document's content in its entirety, making it easy to assemble new documents, generate insights and reports, drive line-of-business systems, and create a single system of record that combines enterprise and document data.

LEARN MORE

How Docugami Works

PROCESS

Upload & Organize

UNDERSTAND

Unlock & Analyze

CREATE

Author & Conceptualize

CONNECT

Automate & Visualize

SCHEDULE A DEMO

The Docugami Difference

Artificial intelligence - for business users.
Immediate results. No complex setup.​​​
Works with your “small data” - as few as 5 documents.​
Made for long-form documents - in any industry sector.
Represents unstructured text and tables in well-known formats for computer systems to use.
AI-assisted document authoring for better accuracy, consistency, and productivity.

Docugami Works with Your Familiar Tools

Suffering From Document Dysfunction?

TECH CRUNCH 

“Docugami plans to change that with a system that intuitively understands any set of documents and intelligently indexes their contents- and NASA is already on board.”

“Extracting actionable data from complex, long-form documents has immense potential for enterprise automation. The Docugami team has a deep understanding of document structures and has used that knowledge along with the latest AI techniques to transform unstructured documents into structured reports and data consumable by any other business application and process.”
